skills.name: Deployment experience with LLM APIs and frameworks
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms and Docker
Expertise with RAG pipelines and vector databases
Fine-tuning LLMs using PyTorch or TensorFlow
Basic frontend prototyping using Streamlit or Gradio
Knowledge of MLOps tools and practices

feedback: Strong skill alignment in Python, LLM frameworks, and machine learning technologies.
Significant experience in AI/ML engineering roles, though slightly below the preferred range.
Good educational background with technical degrees at B.Tech and MBA levels.
No certifications provided, consider obtaining relevant AI-related certifications.
Excellent communication clarity and resume presentation.
Proven expertise in implementing ML solutions, though more depth in required tools would contribute better.
